System & Documentation.description: Major refactor of the action handling system into a modular, hook-based architecture. Updated all relevant documentation, including creating new READMEs for each action handler.
Added documentation for the new visual styling classes (`.glossary-intro-quote`, etc.) to the `GLOSSARY_ENTRY_DESIGN_GUIDE.md`.
Created a comprehensive, hierarchical rules glossary for D20 Tests, including Ability Checks, Saving Throws, and Attack Rolls. Refactored rules into multiple focused entries.
Refactored `version_history.json` to be grouped by feature. Updated `AI_PROMPT_GUIDE.md` to reflect the new structure.
Introduced a version_history.json file to track feature changes and their specific versions. Updated AI_PROMPT_GUIDE.md to explain the new system.

Glossary Content.description: Added a new 'Exploration' section to the Rules Glossary, including a deep hierarchy for vision, light, objects, travel, and more.
Created a comprehensive, hierarchical rules glossary for D20 Tests, including Ability Checks, Saving Throws, and Attack Rolls. Refactored rules into multiple focused entries.
Added a new 'Spells' category to the glossary, organized hierarchically by level. Created initial Markdown files for several spells.

Glossary UI.description: Refactored the glossary data structure to support nested index files, allowing for a more scalable and organized rules section.
Applied enhanced visual styling (`.glossary-intro-quote`, `.glossary-example-list`, `.glossary-callout`) to several entries in the Rules Glossary for improved readability.
Updated all spell entries to use a more visually appealing 'stat block' design with individual 'chiclet' blocks for properties, and added corresponding CSS.

Spell Data Model.description: Added the 'Levitate' spell to the game's data files, class spell lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Feather Fall' spell to the game's data files, class spell lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Shocking Grasp' cantrip to the game's data files, class spell lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Acid Splash' cantrip to the game's data files and glossary. Also added the Sorcerer class to the game data, as it was listed on the spell card.
Added the 'Resistance' cantrip to the game's data files and glossary, based on its updated functionality.
Added the 'Word of Radiance' cantrip to the game's data files, class lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Spare the Dying' cantrip to the game's data files, class lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Toll the Dead' cantrip to the game's data files, class lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Healing Word' spell to the game's data files, class lists, and glossary.
Added the 'Inflict Wounds' spell data and glossary entry based on the provided spell card.
Added the 'Light' cantrip data and glossary entry.

Completed Phase 1 of spell data refactor. Migrated all spell definitions from `constants.ts` to individual JSON files in `public/data/spells/`. Created a `SpellProvider` to dynamically load this data. Refactored all components to use the new context-based data source instead of static imports.

Migrated to the new unified spell data template. Updated the `Spell` interface in `src/types.ts` and refactored `constants.ts` to use the new structure for all spells, including the new detailed examples for fireball, alarm, and alter-self.
Added 'availableTo' property to the Spell data model to track which classes can learn each spell and at what level. Updated relevant JSON and Markdown files.

Glossary Search.description: Fixed an issue preventing manual collapsing of categories during an active search and an issue that caused auto-scrolling to the top of the glossary.
Fixed a critical UI bug where the search input field would lose focus after typing a single character, by refactoring state updates into a useEffect hook.

Battle Map.description: Synced 'Your Party' composition with the main game state, replacing the hardcoded development party.
Refactored combat system to a D&D 5e-style action economy (Action, Bonus Action, Movement) from the previous AP system.
